extension.name: S5 Image Slide
extension.author: Shape5.com
extension.description: This is a responsive module that will display images of any url, and module poitions, with Mootools/Jquery transitions. You set the slide transition.

field.name: pretext
field.label: Pre-Text
field.description: Enter any pre-text message.

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

field.name: s5_arrowshide
field.label: Hide/Show Navigation Arrows
field.description: Choose if would like to show or hide the arrows.

field.name: s5_thumbnailhide
field.label: Hide/Show Thumbnails
field.description: Choose if would like to show or hide the thumbnails.

field.name: s5_stopplayhide
field.label: Hide/Show Stop and Play buttons
field.description: Choose if would like to show or hide the stop and play buttons.

field.name: s5_rotate
field.label: Auto Rotate Images
field.description: Choose to auto rotate through images or manually rotate.

field.name: s5_imageslidestyle
field.label: Fader Effect
field.description: Choose the jQuery effect you would like to have between image transitions.

field.name: tween_time
field.label: Tween Time (in seconds)
field.description: The amount of time in seconds an image takes to fade.

field.name: display_time
field.label: Display Time (in seconds)
field.description: The amount of time in seconds an image will show.

field.name: height
field.label: Height
field.description: Enter the height of the image slider.

field.name: width
field.label: Width
field.description: Enter the width of the image slider.

field.name: s5_responosive
field.label: Enable Responsive Layout?
field.description: If you choose yes, the module's width will become 100% of the available area, and will adjust to any screeen size.

field.name: xml_s5_ischoosemode
field.label: Choose 10 mod positions or below image
field.description: Choose either module mode where you publish modules to 1 of 10 positions and you will slide between each position or choose image mode where you enter in image urls and links below to slide between.

field.name: spacer0
field.label: You may enter up to 10 images. If you do not wish to use 10 simply leave the extra fields blank. IMPORTANT - Do not leave fields blank between images, ie: If you are only using 4 images then fields for images 1,2,3,4 should be filled in, not images 1,3,5,6 or any other order like it.

field.name: picture1
field.label: Image 1 Location URL
field.description: Enter the entire URL of image 1.

field.name: picture1link
field.label: Image 1 Hyperlink URL (leave blank if none)
field.description: Enter the entire Hyperlink URL (leave blank if none) of image 1, leave blank if none.

field.name: picture1target
field.label: Image 1 Link Target
field.description: Open hyperlink for image 1 in New Window or same?
